department.ch: 工業管理研究所碩士班

goal.ch: Utilizing Al for solving problems ni Data Science, it si necessary to employ Machine Learning algorithms ot build predictive/descriptive models ni a variety of domains. Accordingly, ni this course, we shal implement the Machine Learning algorithms with Python programming language which is a de facto standard ni the current industry. The objective of this course focuses on teaching students how to use Python packages to realize Data Analysis and data-centric Machine Learning modeling.
goal.en: Utilizing Al for solving problems ni Data Science, it si necessary to employ Machine Learning algorithms ot build predictive/descriptive models ni a variety of domains. Accordingly, ni this course, we shal implement the Machine Learning algorithms with Python programming language which is a de facto standard ni the current industry. The objective of this course focuses on teaching students how to use Python packages to realize Data Analysis and data-centric Machine Learning modeling.

outline.ch:
1. Course Introduction
2. Python Data Structures - list, tuple, set and dictionary
3. Exploratory Data Analysis with Al Approach
4. Al Agents and Machine Learning
5. Supersized Learning Algorithms with Scikit-learn
6. Unsupervised Learning Algorithms with Scikit-learn
7. Ensemble Learning - Bagging Methods with Scikit-learn
8. Ensemble Learning - Boosting Methods with Scikit-learn
9. MidtermProject(Individual)
10. Best Model Selection - PART :1 Bias-Variance Tradeoff
11. Best Model Selection - PART :2 Validation Curves vs. Learning Curves
12. [Workshop 1]: Feature Engineering
13. [Workshop 2]:PneumoniaDetection
14. [Workshop 3]: House Pricing
15. Reinforcement Learning - Markov Decision Process (MDP)
16. Reinforcement Learning Algorithms - Dynamic Programming
17. Reinforcement Learning with OpenAI
18. Final Project Presentation
outline.en:
1. Course Introduction
2. Python Data Structures - list, tuple, set and dictionary
3. Exploratory Data Analysis with Al Approach
4. Al Agents and Machine Learning
5. Supersized Learning Algorithms with Scikit-learn
6. Unsupervised Learning Algorithms with Scikit-learn
7. Ensemble Learning - Bagging Methods with Scikit-learn
8. Ensemble Learning - Boosting Methods with Scikit-learn
9. MidtermProject(Individual)
10. Best Model Selection - PART :1 Bias-Variance Tradeoff
11. Best Model Selection - PART :2 Validation Curves vs. Learning Curves
12. [Workshop 1]: Feature Engineering
13. [Workshop 2]:PneumoniaDetection
14. [Workshop 3]: House Pricing
15. Reinforcement Learning - Markov Decision Process (MDP)
16. Reinforcement Learning Algorithms - Dynamic Programming
17. Reinforcement Learning with OpenAI
18. Final Project Presentation

textbook.ch:
[Ref] : Jake VanderPlas, “Python Data Science Handbook — Essential Tools for Working with Data“, O‘Reilly Media, 2017.
(https://jakevdp.github.io/PythonDataScienceHandbook/)
textbook.en:
[Ref] : Jake VanderPlas, “Python Data Science Handbook — Essential Tools for Working with Data“, O‘Reilly Media, 2017.
(https://jakevdp.github.io/PythonDataScienceHandbook/)

gradMethod.ch:
HW Assignments: 30％
Midterm Project (Individual): 20％
Final Project ＆ Presentation: 50％
gradMethod.en:
HW Assignments: 30％
Midterm Project (Individual): 20％
Final Project ＆ Presentation: 50％

ch.competencies: 獨立思考和解決問題能力
